thread.title: Sam Rogers to speak at a community event in March
thread.title_full: Sam Rogers to speak at a community event in March

author: Evan G. Watkins
title: Sam Rogers to speak at a community event in March
text:
Sam Rogers to speak at a community event in March Sam Rogers will speak at Hanover High School in March in a free, community-wide event. Slot to Virginia Tech Links (Photo: Peter Casey, USA TODAY Sports) 
Virginia Tech fullback, Sam Rogers , will return to his home town on Sunday, March 12 th , to share his story in a free, community-wide event. 
Rogers is a former walk-on who earned a scholarship at Virginia Tech for his hard work and became a staple in the Hokies offense over the years. In his career, Rogers recorded 11 total touchdowns (four rushing, seven receiving) and threw one touchdown during his senior year. 
Rogers will return to Hanover High School on March 12 th to discuss “how faith, hard work and perseverance help him to overcome challenges, exceed expectations and achieve his goals.” 
Rogers is currently rated as the top fullback in the 2017 NFL Draft. 
The doors open at 5:30 PM at the Hanover High School Auditorium and the event is free and open to the public. 
(Want to stay up to date with Virginia Tech? Sign up today for our FREE Hokies Newsletter! ) Author
